verses.text: And it shall come to pass, when all these \w things|strong="H1697"\w* are \w come|strong="H0935"\w* upon thee, the \w blessing|strong="H1293"\w* and the \w curse|strong="H7045"\w*, which I have \w set|strong="H5414"\w* \w before|strong="H6440"\w* thee, and thou shalt \w call|strong="H7725"\w* \add them\add* to \w mind|strong="H3824"\w* among all the \w nations|strong="H1471"\w*, whither the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* thy \w God|strong="H0430"\w* hath \w driven|strong="H5080"\w* thee,

And shalt \w return|strong="H7725"\w* unto the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* thy \w God|strong="H0430"\w*, and shalt \w obey|strong="H8085"\w* his \w voice|strong="H6963"\w* according to all that I \w command|strong="H6680"\w* thee this \w day|strong="H3117"\w*, thou and thy \w children|strong="H1121"\w*, with all thine \w heart|strong="H3824"\w*, and with all thy \w soul|strong="H5315"\w*;

That then the 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d* thy \w God|strong="H0430"\w* will \w turn|strong="H7725"\w* thy \w captivity|strong="H7622"\w*, and have \w compassion|strong="H7355"\w* upon thee, and will \w return|strong="H7725"\w* and \w gather|strong="H6908"\w* thee from all the \w nations|strong="H5971"\w*, whither the 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d* thy \w God|strong="H0430"\w* hath \w scattered|strong="H6327"\w* thee.

If \add any\add* of thine be driven \w out|strong="H5080"\w* unto the \w outmost|strong="H7097"\w* \add parts\add* of \w heaven|strong="H8064"\w*, from thence will the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* thy \w God|strong="H0430"\w* \w gather|strong="H6908"\w* thee, and from thence will he \w fetch|strong="H3947"\w* thee:

And the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* thy \w God|strong="H0430"\w* will \w bring|strong="H0935"\w* thee into the \w land|strong="H0776"\w* which thy \w fathers|strong="H0001"\w* \w possessed|strong="H3423"\w*, and thou shalt \w possess|strong="H3423"\w* it; and he will do thee \w good|strong="H3190"\w*, and \w multiply|strong="H7235"\w* thee above thy \w fathers|strong="H0001"\w*.

And the 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d* thy \w God|strong="H0430"\w* will \w circumcise|strong="H4135"\w* thine \w heart|strong="H3824"\w*, and the \w heart|strong="H3824"\w* of thy \w seed|strong="H2233"\w*, to \w love|strong="H0157"\w* the 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d* thy \w God|strong="H0430"\w* with all thine \w heart|strong="H3824"\w*, and with all thy \w soul|strong="H5315"\w*, that thou mayest \w live|strong="H2416"\w*.

And the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* thy \w God|strong="H0430"\w* will \w put|strong="H5414"\w* all these \w curses|strong="H0423"\w* upon thine \w enemies|strong="H0341"\w*, and on them that \w hate|strong="H8130"\w* thee, which \w persecuted|strong="H7291"\w* thee.

And thou shalt \w return|strong="H7725"\w* and \w obey|strong="H8085"\w* the \w voice|strong="H6963"\w* of the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*, and \w do|strong="H6213"\w* all his \w commandments|strong="H4687"\w* which I \w command|strong="H6680"\w* thee this \w day|strong="H3117"\w*.

And the 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d* thy \w God|strong="H0430"\w* will make thee \w plenteous|strong="H3498"\w* in every \w work|strong="H4639"\w* of thine \w hand|strong="H3027"\w*, in the \w fruit|strong="H6529"\w* of thy \w body|strong="H0990"\w*, and in the \w fruit|strong="H6529"\w* of thy \w cattle|strong="H0929"\w*, and in the \w fruit|strong="H6529"\w* of thy \w land|strong="H0127"\w*, for \w good|strong="H2896"\w*: for the 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d* will \w again|strong="H7725"\w* \w rejoice|strong="H7797"\w* over thee for \w good|strong="H2896"\w*, as he \w rejoiced|strong="H7797"\w* over thy \w fathers|strong="H0001"\w*:

If thou shalt \w hearken|strong="H8085"\w* unto the \w voice|strong="H6963"\w* of the 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d* thy \w God|strong="H0430"\w*, to \w keep|strong="H8104"\w* his \w commandments|strong="H4687"\w* and his \w statutes|strong="H2708"\w* which are \w written|strong="H3789"\w* in this \w book|strong="H5612"\w* of the \w law|strong="H8451"\w*, \add and\add* if thou \w turn|strong="H7725"\w* unto the 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d* thy \w God|strong="H0430"\w* with all thine \w heart|strong="H3824"\w*, and with all thy \w soul|strong="H5315"\w*.

¶ For this \w commandment|strong="H4687"\w* which I \w command|strong="H6680"\w* thee this \w day|strong="H3117"\w*, it \add is\add* not \w hidden|strong="H6381"\w* from thee, neither \add is\add* it far \w off|strong="H7350"\w*.

It \add is\add* not in \w heaven|strong="H8064"\w*, that thou shouldest \w say|strong="H0559"\w*, Who shall go \w up|strong="H5927"\w* for us to \w heaven|strong="H8064"\w*, and \w bring|strong="H3947"\w* it unto us, that we may \w hear|strong="H8085"\w* it, and \w do|strong="H6213"\w* it?

Neither \add is\add* it \w beyond|strong="H5676"\w* the \w sea|strong="H3220"\w*, that thou shouldest \w say|strong="H0559"\w*, Who shall \w go|strong="H5674"\w* \w over|strong="H5676"\w* the \w sea|strong="H3220"\w* for us, and \w bring|strong="H3947"\w* it unto us, that we may \w hear|strong="H8085"\w* it, and \w do|strong="H6213"\w* it?

But the \w word|strong="H1697"\w* \add is\add* \w very|strong="H3966"\w* \w nigh|strong="H7138"\w* unto thee, in thy \w mouth|strong="H6310"\w*, and in thy \w heart|strong="H3824"\w*, that thou mayest \w do|strong="H6213"\w* it.

¶ \w See|strong="H7200"\w*, I have \w set|strong="H5414"\w* \w before|strong="H6440"\w* thee this \w day|strong="H3117"\w* \w life|strong="H2416"\w* and \w good|strong="H2896"\w*, and \w death|strong="H4194"\w* and \w evil|strong="H7451"\w*;

In that I \w command|strong="H6680"\w* thee this \w day|strong="H3117"\w* to \w love|strong="H0157"\w* the 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d* thy \w God|strong="H0430"\w*, to \w walk|strong="H3212"\w* in his \w ways|strong="H1870"\w*, and to \w keep|strong="H8104"\w* his \w commandments|strong="H4687"\w* and his \w statutes|strong="H2708"\w* and his \w judgments|strong="H4941"\w*, that thou mayest \w live|strong="H2421"\w* and \w multiply|strong="H7235"\w*: and the 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d* thy \w God|strong="H0430"\w* shall \w bless|strong="H1288"\w* thee in the \w land|strong="H0776"\w* whither thou \w goest|strong="H0935"\w* to \w possess|strong="H3423"\w* it.

But if thine \w heart|strong="H3824"\w* turn \w away|strong="H6437"\w*, so that thou wilt not \w hear|strong="H8085"\w*, but shalt be drawn \w away|strong="H5080"\w*, and \w worship|strong="H7812"\w* \w other|strong="H0312"\w* \w gods|strong="H0430"\w*, and \w serve|strong="H5647"\w* them;

I \w denounce|strong="H5046"\w* unto you this \w day|strong="H3117"\w*, that ye shall \w surely|strong="H0006"\w* \w perish|strong="H0006"\w*, \add and that\add* ye shall not \w prolong|strong="H0748"\w* \add your\add* \w days|strong="H3117"\w* upon the \w land|strong="H0127"\w*, whither thou passest \w over|strong="H5674"\w* \w Jordan|strong="H3383"\w* to \w go|strong="H0935"\w* to \w possess|strong="H3423"\w* it.

I \w call|strong="H5749"\w* \w heaven|strong="H8064"\w* and \w earth|strong="H0776"\w* to \w record|strong="H5749"\w* this \w day|strong="H3117"\w* against you, \add that\add* I have \w set|strong="H5414"\w* \w before|strong="H6440"\w* you \w life|strong="H2416"\w* and \w death|strong="H4194"\w*, \w blessing|strong="H1293"\w* and \w cursing|strong="H7045"\w*: therefore \w choose|strong="H0977"\w* \w life|strong="H2416"\w*, that both thou and thy \w seed|strong="H2233"\w* may \w live|strong="H2421"\w*:

That thou mayest \w love|strong="H0157"\w* the 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d* thy \w God|strong="H0430"\w*, \add and\add* that thou mayest \w obey|strong="H8085"\w* his \w voice|strong="H6963"\w*, and that thou mayest \w cleave|strong="H1692"\w* unto him: for he \add is\add* thy \w life|strong="H2416"\w*, and the \w length|strong="H0753"\w* of thy \w days|strong="H3117"\w*: that thou mayest \w dwell|strong="H3427"\w* in the \w land|strong="H0127"\w* which the 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d* \w sware|strong="H7650"\w* unto thy \w fathers|strong="H0001"\w*, to \w Abraham|strong="H0085"\w*, to \w Isaac|strong="H3327"\w*, and to \w Jacob|strong="H3290"\w*, to \w give|strong="H5414"\w* them.
